Header: SL To Be Developed Into Air And Maritime Hub Of Asia – Says The President
Content: President Maithripala Sirisena said that the government expects to develop Sri Lanka as the air and maritime hub of the Asian region. He stated this while addressing the 53rd Conference of the Asia Atlantic Civil Aviation Director General’s launch in Colombo yesterday (01st) morning. Addressing the conference, Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe said Sri Lanka will develop its domestic aviation industry to international standards. The 53rd Conference of Asia Atlantic Civil Aviation Director Generals will be held in Colombo until August 5th.
